imdb.plot outline: Friends setting up a blind date with someone who doesn't know they are prejudice. What the world needs now is more Love and less segregation, and more equality and less discrimination. Beautiful young people can be prejudices without knowing it. Because they were brought up by prejudices parents. Believe in or taught to believe in, by society and culture and/or bias education, that they are of Superior race, that is for perfection. Example: people with white skin and blue eyes are better and smarter and above other who are not the same. This Comedy short touch on both Discrimination and how most people are not willing to see this world as it is, we have inequality all around us. Who can over come the misinformed children who will grow up into citizen of some Nation that allow laws to discriminate people based on race and color of their skin. Even from the way people look and talk, can be a factor for bias judgment, believe to be below intelligent and do not deserve respect or the same treatment as their own kind. Motto: Amount of truth to show the real world of how some people don't really look and know they are among the superior race. Ha ha. Love each other and help each other to make this world we live in a better world with a more respectful future.
imdb.title: Who's she talking to?
plot: Peter is a down on his luck Chinese-American looking for love. Friends support him and tell him not be negative. Time does not stop for people to find their true love. True love is out there and we must always seek it out.::Peter Chen

Friends setting up a blind date with someone who doesn't know they are prejudice. What the world needs now is more Love and less segregation, and more equality and less discrimination. Who can over come the misinformed children who will grow up into citizen of some Nation that allow laws to discriminate people based on race and color of their skin.
